issue.title: [C++/Python] hdfs delegation token functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1321](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1321). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
HDFS can create delegation tokens for an authenticated user, so that access to the file-system from other processes/machines can authenticate as that same user without having to use third-party identity systems (kerberos, etc.).

arrow-hdfs should provide the ability to accept, create, renew and cancel delegation tokens.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1321?focusedCommentId=17392863) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
It's not obvious how that would fit into the current FileSystem API. Feel free to explain your needs a bit more precisely.
